Description:
Responsibilities:Maintain configuration and functional design documents and support role-based profile changes. Perform all tasks in the development cycle, starting from business process definition, to configuration and unit testing, assistance and follow-up with user testing, to co-ordination of transports to Production, to training and post-live support and fixes, etc.
Functional and technical expertise to develop SAP PaPM solutions and best address customer requirement and provide expertise in SAP PaPM.
Work well under cost and time constraints and good understanding of allocation, profitability and SAP PaPM.
Implement customer specific profitability solutions, analyze client business process and build models in the areas of cost accounting, allocation and transfer pricing.
Tested and migrated successfully to SAP FPSL from Bank Analyzer 8.5.
Perform configurations with respect to the SAP FP-SL architecture and components like SDL, RDL, CVPM and reporting integration with SAP Analytics Cloud.
Handle Business Requirements Management on accounting standards IFRS9.
Translate functional requirements into solution design for configuration of SAP FPSL.
Design of functional and technical concepts in financial sub-ledger accounting (SAP FPSL).
Good Knowledge on Data modelling, ETL, Training and Knowledge transfer.Essential Skills:4+ years relevant experience in SAP
Must have SAP Technical knowledge and good understanding of allocation, inventory,  profitability and SAP PaPM.
Ability to provide solution SAP S/4HANA costing.
Experience in SAP implementation at banking industry.
Cloud Essentials experience
Must have worked on implementation of the central financial software FPSL Finance
Must have configured Integration of the central subsidiary ledger FPSL in S/4HANA Finance.
Experience in SAP Profitability & Performance Management (PaPM), SAP Financial Performance Management (FS_PER) SAP FI/CO, SAP HANA Finance and Cost Management.
Must be confident in Solution design and configuration of SAP FPSL.
Experience in Banking sector and Accounting business processesEssential Qualification:Bachelors is a mustJob Details
